name: Terra SG
description: We unite people to rethink possibilities and create positive social & environmental changes for the world we live in.Terra SG is a people-powered movement for positive environmental change. As a social enterprise with sustainability and humanitarian focuses, Terra SG’s work revolves around initiating and empowering people through running eco-education programmes, building green spaces, organising sustainable events, managing the Sustainable Singapore Gallery and powering upcycling activities & workshops.
